note.p: American lawyer and diplomat. Consul at Valencia, Spain, 1866–7. Practised law in New York, 1869–71. Lived in Mentone, France. Published articles on ethnology, archaeology, and folklore
Obituary record of graduates of Yale University … 1900–1910 (New Haven: The Tuttle, Morehouse & Taylor Co., 1910), pp. 1212–13.
